ReportBundle.ReportXML: <Report ReportGID="bd2e1f43-3cf7-4101-9523-b6169e9e7ac6" ReportUseType="2" ReportType="5" ReportName="Inventory Balance Report" Description="Summary of Purchases, Sales and Usage" CreatedDT="2014-03-14T14:47:54.747" ModifiedDT="2015-03-26T11:31:57.9" ModifiedBy="VAS" ConcurrencyTS="AAAAAAAdc2g=" ReportVersion="1" />

ReportQuery.ReportQueryText:
<QueryBundle> <QueryText>select * from (SELECT TransactionDT = CONVERT(date, DATEADD(SECOND, -it.DurationSeconds, case when it.TransactionType = 2 then d.DeliveryDT else it.TransactionDT end)) ,it.InventoryTransactionGID ,it.TransactionType ,it2.InventoryItemName ,it.UnitQuantity ,'AFLbs' = case when l.locationtype = 0 then -1 else 1 end * dbo.getmeasurementvalue(it.unitquantity,c.MediumMeasurementType) ,'AFTons' = case when l.locationtype = 0 then -1 else 1 end * round(dbo.getmeasurementvalue(it.unitquantity,c.LargeMeasurementType),2) ,'Cost' = isnull(round(dbo.GetFIFOCost(it.unitquantity, it.inventoryitemgid, case when l.locationtype = 0 then l.locationgid else l2.locationgid end, it.transactiondt)/nullif(dbo.getmeasurementvalue(it.unitquantity,c.LargeMeasurementType),0),0),2) ,'Total' = case when l.locationtype = 0 then -1 else 1 end * round(dbo.GetFIFOCost(it.unitquantity, it.inventoryitemgid, case when l.locationtype = 0 then l.locationgid else l2.locationgid end, it.transactiondt),2) ,itl.[PhysicalInventoryDT] FROM InventoryTransaction it
JOIN InventoryItem it2 on it.InventoryItemGID = it2.InventoryItemGID JOIN InventoryItemLocation itl on itl.InventoryItemGID = it.InventoryItemGID JOIN Company c on it2.CompanyGID = c.CompanyGID JOIN Location l on l.LocationGID = it.FromLocationGID JOIN Location l2 on l2.LocationGID = it.ToLocationGID LEFT JOIN Delivery d on d.InventoryTransactionGID = it.InventoryTransactionGID
WHERE l.LocationType = 0 or l2.LocationType = 0) z where 1 = 1 and TransactionDT >= ISNULL(z.PhysicalInventoryDT,'01/01/2070')</QueryText> <PreQueryText /> </QueryBundle>
